products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Bring a plush white sheen into your home by choosing the cosmic white gloss, a shiny painted venetian blind from the cotswold deluxe range. This clean, fresh window dressing has all of the high end features of a designer blind, including coordinating linen ladder tapes and a top quality finish. For an ultra-modern and incredibly striking look in a dining room, go all white. Furnish the room from top to bottom in white, from walls to flooring to furniture, and the cosmic white gloss will fit right in.

products.title: Faux Suede, White - Roman Blind
products.description: The faux suede in white takes a lightweight, suede-feel cloth and covers it with a sea of pure white, making for an icy cool blind that gets its warmth from its soft texture. This supple fabric will fold easily into the pleated curves of the roman, leaving a dreamy and wistful ambience. The white offers a beautifully clean aesthetic, making it the perfect base from which to add brighteror darker hues with plenty of personality.

products.title: Bird Garden, Canvas - Roman Blind
products.description: Incorporate the enchanting bird garden canvas into your dcor for a sophisticated look with charming detail, where a soft, cotton-like fabric hosts a display of feathered friends and creative foliage in soothing white on a mild oatmeal background. Display the canvas amid layers of splendid linen in harmonising caramel and biscuit shades, framing the blind with honeyed fabrics and complementing colours.

products.title: Vogue, White - Day Night Blind
products.description: The sharp, icy hue of the vogue in white gives a clean and fresh look, and the sleekness of the fabric does nothing to contradict it. With its moveable translucent strips, for privacy and light control, this blind is truly the height of contemporary style. Team the white with a deep, dark navy blue to form a naval theme in the dining room. A navy feature wall, with the blind sat in its midst, will look simply stunning.

products.title: Windsor, White - Roman Blind
products.description: Pure and simple, the windsor white is the colour of snow, and adds a cool and refreshing vibe to the home without compromising on class or elegance. This light and pretty shade forms a beautiful roman blind, strengthened in appearance by the shimmering sheen of the silk-like fabric. The white can be paired with any colour combination you choose. It will look particularly attractive against a petrol blue shade to craft a contemporary nautical look in the bathroom.

products.title: Nairobi, Snow - Roman Blind
products.description: The nairobi in snow adds a casual sense of glamour to any room, with its chocolate animal print and beautiful sketches. The fabric contains linen, giving it lasting durability as well as that classic linen look and feel. Hang the snow amidst similar browns and creams, and consider a deep chocolate feature wall for a striking look. Add shimmering golds and plush camels for a truly luxurious style, and be sure to throw in plenty of soft fabrics for extra comfort.

products.title: Astral, Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to reinvent your interiors and breathe new life into proceedings, your window spaces hold the key. Astral snow enables you to introduce a soft grey and a creamy base colour so that you have plenty of new creative avenues you could go down. It's all about simple neutral colours that subtly transform into one another when you want that relaxing homely vibe. Magnolia walls, a light stained wooden floor, and a few lamps rather than dazzling overhead lighting are all you really need to make things nice and cosy.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Snow - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Roller, 1028 White - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Flying Pleated, 1016 White - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1016 white - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Luxa, White - Vista Blind
products.description: Every square inch of luxa white shimmers in the sunlight as it serves as the perfect transition between light and shade. With a finely woven fabric accompanied by a delicate voile to offer you complete control of ambience and light, luxa white allows you to create the perfect environment to suit your mood. Crisp and clean, the modern lines of luxa white make it ideal for the modern fitted bathroom where you can add an understated feature that won't confront your existing decor.

Roman blind, 6500 delicious white - velux loft blind soft lighting effects - opaquenot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility.

products.title: Venetian, 7001 White - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Control amount and direction of incoming light and shadows. Water and stain resistant - well suited for bathrooms and kitchens. products.title: Daytona, Vivid White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: White doesn't get much whiter or brighter than the daytona in vivid white. This icy white hue covers the durable faux wood of the shutter flawlessly, and works wonderfully as any of their different style options: tier on tier, caf, or full height. Pair the vivid white with any colour scheme you like, but for a truly striking style, stick to an all-white theme in an open-plan kitchen. Think white walls, white units, white floor, white everything - the look will be bold and vivacious, and certainly hard to forget.

products.title: Daytona, Antique White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: Daytona's antique white offers a beautiful classic white with a vintage overtone. The faux wood is durable and resistant to cracking and warping from moisture, wear, and tear. It's also an energy efficient solution for your home. Choose from three different styles. Use the antique white as part of a shabby chic or vintage dcor scheme, surrounding it with dusky shades of pink or blue for a pretty yet elegant look in a bedroom or living room.

products.title: Daytona, Cool White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: Available in three distinct yet equally lovely styles, the daytona cool white is neutral, calming, and stylish. Go for the caf for a boutique look, full height for a classic shutter, or tier on tier for something with a difference and plenty of flexibility. Set the cool white against equally cool pastel shades, such as mint green or baby blue. Accessorise throughout with matching pastel hues, as well as plenty of white.

products.title: Daytona, Pure White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona in pure white offers a classic white tone that will work in any surrounding. Made from high quality, durable faux wood, the shutter is designed to resist cracking and warping. Choose from three key styles: full height, caf, or tier on tier. Paint the wall surrounding the pure white in a bold, cheery colour that will allow the shutter to stand out and create a focal point in the room. Think apple green in the kitchen, sky blue in the home office, or lemon yellow in the guest bedroom.

products.title: Bayham, Pure White - Vista Blind
products.description: To allow the light that enters your room to take centre stage your blind should be crisp and clean. Modern lines give bayham pure white the contemporary look that allows it to hang with effortless grace in your home as it offers complete control of the ambient light levels. The finely crafted voile panels serve as the perfect accompaniment for the clean glow of pure white. Keeping your decor simple yet styled is the secret to creating a contemporary home that will stay current for years to come.

products.title: Daytona, Chalk White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The chalk white, from the daytona range, is the ideal addition to a country or vintage-style home. Choose from tier on tier, full height, or caf style shutters, and enjoy the long-lasting durability that the moisture-resistant faux wood brings. Team the chalk white with light, natural woods and soft sage greens in a rustic country home. The look will be natural and peaceful, making it perfect for a kitchen, home office, or living room.
